mesh_provisioning_pdu_types.name: Provisioning Invite
mesh_provisioning_pdu_types.description: Invites an unprovisioned device (the intended Provisionee) to join a mesh network

mesh_provisioning_pdu_types.name: Provisioning Capabilities
mesh_provisioning_pdu_types.description: Indicates the capabilities of the Provisionee

mesh_provisioning_pdu_types.name: Provisioning Start
mesh_provisioning_pdu_types.description: Indicates the provisioning method selected by the Provisioner based on the capabilities of the Provisionee

mesh_provisioning_pdu_types.name: Provisioning Public Key
mesh_provisioning_pdu_types.description: Contains the Public Key of the Provisionee or the Provisioner

mesh_provisioning_pdu_types.name: Provisioning Input Complete
mesh_provisioning_pdu_types.description: Indicates that the user has completed inputting a value

mesh_provisioning_pdu_types.name: Provisioning Confirmation
mesh_provisioning_pdu_types.description: Contains the provisioning confirmation value of the Provisionee or the Provisioner

mesh_provisioning_pdu_types.name: Provisioning Random
mesh_provisioning_pdu_types.description: Contains the provisioning random value of the Provisionee or the Provisioner

mesh_provisioning_pdu_types.name: Provisioning Data
mesh_provisioning_pdu_types.description: Includes the assigned unicast address of the primary element, a network key, NetKey Index, Flags, and the IV Index

mesh_provisioning_pdu_types.name: Provisioning Record Request
mesh_provisioning_pdu_types.description: Indicates a request to retrieve a provisioning record fragment from the Provisionee

mesh_provisioning_pdu_types.name: Provisioning Record Response
mesh_provisioning_pdu_types.description: Contains a provisioning record fragment or an error status, sent in response to a Provisioning Record Request

mesh_provisioning_pdu_types.name: Provisioning Records Get
mesh_provisioning_pdu_types.description: Indicates a request to retrieve the list of IDs of the provisioning records that the Provisionee supports.

mesh_provisioning_pdu_types.name: Provisioning Records List
mesh_provisioning_pdu_types.description: Contains the list of IDs of the provisioning records that the Provisionee supports.
